186022297.review:
The bones of a great driving survival roguelike are there. But just the bones.

Long abandoned, for reasons unclear, as was their next game (Land Lord's Super). Now it seems like they're trying to recycle Jalopy into a "new" game called Honcho. There's an irony that they keep making ramshackle games about ramshackle topics. 

Don't buy any Minskworks stuff. They don't deliver.

A game full of bugs, but it's a chill game who just likes to go almost to infinity and hearing uncle yap most of the time.

Really nice game just really repetitive.

185626938.review:
I'm feeling mixed about this game overall.

Pros:

Fun game play.
-Easy to run on most computers.
-Great for car enthusiasts.

Cons:

-Terrible traffic mechanics: I was 12 kilometers from a checkpoint and had to restart my entire 450-kilometer journey—only for the same issue to happen again.
-Random explosions: Occasionally, your car's durability will drop from whatever state it was in to zero instantly, for no apparent reason.
Aside from these issues, it’s a solid game. Unfortunately, I feel it’s overpriced for what you’re getting—but that’s just my opinion.

Happy hunting!

185596505.review: i would thumbs up this but the publisher are blocking the dev from updating this

185523533.review:
Do not buy this game, it's unfinished (or at least very unpolished) and no longer being worked on.

That said, it's got some cool ideas and I did like it a lot, but all the problems I had with the game are never going to get fixed or improved.

You can play it through to completion, so in that sense it's "finished". However you'll run into game breaking bugs and a general lack of polish.

185491035.review: A good gamed marred by its somewhat incomplete and buggy existence. As far as I can tell unfortunately this game is never going to receive any further updates. Something apparently occurred between the publisher and developers and now the devs are no longer allowed to work on the game further.

185433047.review:
Authentic Trabant user experience. Fittingly it begins in a junk yard.

There is something philosophical about getting emotionally attached to an objectively terrible machine. It sucks, but it gets you there if you treat it right. It's almost cozy. 

Very barebones, but the core gameplay loop works well.

O jogo é muito bom no geral, relaxante e bem bonito (apesar de ser simples). Os Desenvolvedores também parecem ser pessoas muito legais! Todos seus projetos sempre são bem criativos e visualmente legais.

Só tem 2 problemas... o jogo é super bugado, ao ponto que pode ser frustrante pra algumas pessoas. O outro problema é que infelizmente o jogo foi abandonado. Os desenvolvedores até gostariam de continuar trabalhando com o Jalopy, porém tá rolando treta com a Distribuidora (que é bem cuzona).

Os devs já falaram várias vezes que estão tentando recuperar o direito de distribuição do Jalopy, pra poderem realmente finalizar o jogo... e espero que um dia eles consigam! O jogo tem muito potencial e recomendo pra todo mundo que gosta de jogo de viagem/carro.

185217110.review:
[h1]What a bummer.[/h1]
I wanted to like this game.

I own four other janky unity-based car-building/car-driving sims. And out of all the insanity, the jank, the flaws, the lack of tutorial, the car physics, I thought I could get used to Jalopy's physics in a similar way...

But Jalopy's driving mechanics are just... [b]not fun[/b]. Your car moves very slowly on the roads, slow for most car sims, hell, it's even slow for how fast 100kmh feels in MSC or The Long Drive. Your car is a VEB Sachsenring Trabant, a car that is so junky that other junk cars would bully it for how junky it is. It breaks really easily, it's engine's fuel is gravity-fed two-stroke, and it's incredibly-prone to damage. In fact, a collision that would barely be a dent in MSC is major damage in Jalopy. 

Now honestly, [b]I would've been able to deal with that.[/b] I would've been able to deal with slow speed and the fragility of the car, if it weren't for [b]one single, little problem[/b] that this game has- a crucial feature of a driving sim that is so busted that it warrants it's own section:

[h1]THE STEERING[/h1]
[b]Jalopy's steering is not gradual.[/b] It does not turn the wheel over time, when you press left or right on the keys, it jerks to the left or right by (about) 10-15 degrees. Usually if you barely press the steering keys on a driving sim, it'll turn a little bit, but stop when you let go, Jalopy doesn't do that. When you press the button, it goes in large chunky intervals.

There are [b]many[/b] gradual turns and twists in this game that require more-precise and gradual input to actually take, even at the slow pace of this game, but holy crap, the steering makes it completely annoying and not-fun. Even using a controller won't save you from this game's godawful steering. Controller input treats left or right movement like a keypress, not like a gradual pushing of a control stick, it's no different on or off a keyboard.

The steering is so chunky it's freakin' steak-sized, and it expects you to make gradual turns with these controls.

[b]This is why people hate this game.[/b]

[h1]The Sad Part[/h1]  
None of these issues will get fixed. The publisher apparently has decided to be a douche, took the rights of the game away from the developer, and ran. I don't know the whole truth, but this seems to be the consensus.

I'm bummed at the state of this game. The atmosphere is absolutely incredible, other users comment on the accuracy towards east-european architecture and feel, and the graphics aren't even that horrible, But the bad steering of this game just completely ruined it for me.

It's just a sad shame is what it is.

184585482.review: o jogo é bom... é um jogo bem legal, porém, possuir bugs, o que acaba que gera insatisfação durante a gameplay. esse é um jogo que eu almejava muito em ter e derrepente ele me apareceu por 6 reais e comprei, mas fiquei triste em saber que o jogo tem apenas algumas cidades e a história é bem curta (cerca de 5 horas). Eu não esperava isso, esperava mais... E tem mais uma coisa, dps que seu tio te deixa a carta final e vc chega na turquia, basicamente acabou o jogo, porque não tem mais cidades para vc dar continuação a sua viajem. nao deu tempo nem de eu juntar dinheiro suficiente para tunar todo meu carro, infelizmente. se vc quer um jogo legal e simples, rapido de zerar, é bem vantajoso por 6 reais. vc tem um carro legal, seu tio é gente boa, as customizações do carro é ótima, a ideia do jogo é incrível. porém, jogo muito curto e dps que vc chega no final, nao tem mais nada a nao ser vc da meia volta e retorna na sua primeira cidade

184541267.review:
数十分だけプレイした感想
バグが多すぎる、、、こまめセーブしないと積む可能性大
あとマニュアルを読み込まないとわからない操作が多すぎる。
もう少し自然と説明をするか、
チュートリアルの時点で画面にオーバーレイさせて車の操作を表示させてほしい。
あとタイヤをボルトを締めて固定しよう！という序盤の場面も　
ジャッキにレンチ？が付いてるのに気づかずなんどもやりなおした。
レンチとった描写なんかあったか、、？
そもそも持ってきてほしいものに入ってなかった気がする。
左後ろのタイヤのボルトを締めた時点でなぜか叔父さんが車に乗り込んでしまい
左前のタイヤはすでに設置しているにも関わらず、
延々とタイヤをもってこいと言われる始末。
挙句の果てに車に乗り込んださいの叔父さんの
説明の途中の文字に”タイヤ”の文字が混ざるバグまで発生した。
とりあえず最初のモーテルになんとかたどり着いたが、モーテルの鍵を持ったまま
あ、そういえばラジオ消してないな、と思いラジオとライトを消しにいったら
ワイパーを作動させてしまいあれ、、ワイパーの止め方がわからん！となり
マニュアルを読もうと手に取ったら
気づいたら部屋の鍵が消失していて部屋に入れず積んだ、、
デバッグちゃんとしてるんだろうか、、。
想定以外の動きについて検証してなさすぎる気がする。
リスタートしたら完全に最初からであーむり！となってゲームを閉じた。
他のレビューにもあるようにこまめにセーブ（バグが発生してない時点で）
をしておかないと簡単に積むゲームかも。
つかれちゃったわね。。オートセーブ機能とかつけてほしい。
（バグってない状態で最近のデータから再開できるようにする感じというか。）
あるいはチャプターごとにロードできる感じとかほしい。
まったり楽しめそうで説明不足とバグのせいで全然まったり出来ないゲームである。
慣れたら楽しいかも、でもいまのところはちょっとぐったり。

184295218.review:
[h1]This whole game is a jalopy...[/h1]

[h3]The Good[/h3]
Originally caught my interest as a poor man's Pacific Drive.  Thought it'd scratch that driving sim itch while having a change of scenery.

[h3]The Bad[/h3]
First of all, the steering doesn't work.  Idk if I did something wrong with the car, if there's a glitch that requires me to make a new save file, or if the developers for whatever reason decided that cars don't need to steer?  I've read the reviews talking about bad controls but I thought it was just jank from an indie game.  I wasn't expecting it to be completely game breaking.  Not even an hour in and this thing is already unplayable!

[h3]The Ugly[/h3]
Apparently, the publisher pulled the plug on this game?  The last update for this thing was back in 2019 so I guess it's safe to say we won't be seeing anymore polish and refinement (or even fixes to gamebreaking bugs).  Shame too because I feel this could have been something... not a great game but at least something like a janky car with some charm to it.  Instead, we just have something that will probably just lay forgotten in the scrap yard.

I'm going back to the Olympic Exclusion Zone

183715601.review:
If you always wanted to travel Europe inside an old post-war trabant/lada that always breaks down, this could be the game for you. (If its on sale)

You can upgrade your car, scavenge wrecks for parts, take stuff that randomly lies on the road across borders, disturb sleeping motel guests and enjoy the many bugs the game brings to the table.

Uncle is in for a ride of his life. Literally.

All Jokes aside, it is a fun game. even if the fun might be short-lived, since its got lots of bugs to come by.
